description:
The Dragon Tours (Hiryuu Tehai-ya, from the English game) arranges trips on flying dragons to the Tower of Salvation. These trips are sold at the hefty price of 10000 Gald per person.
The Church of Martel donated the required Gald to the http://anidb.net/ch11679 [Chosen] and her party, to allow her passage to the Tower of Salvation and to complete the Journey of Regeneration.
name: Hiryuu Tehai-ya
